0: Of the many outcomes from President Barack Obama‘s Oval Office speech and action to solve the disaster in the Gulf of Mexico, Bill O’Reilly invited Ann Coulter on the Factor tonight to help explain the one he saw most socially impacting: the repeated jabs on the president from Daily Show host Jon Stewart. Coulter’s explanation? Liberals are angry because Obama was their “Tooth Fairy or Santa Claus,” and now they’ve been told that he’s merely human. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR “Reality betrays children constantly,” she argued, and, as children, liberals feel “betrayed.” “The main thing,” she argued, “is that liberals are like children and they believed in Obama the way children believed in the Tooth Fairy or Santa Claus and he can’t stop this spill, and they are enraged.” NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR These liberals, which she deemed the far-left, take environmentalism seriously and find Obama to be too liberal. “Che Guevara would not be liberal enough for them,” she explained, “but they go along with this guy as a stand-in.” Contrast this to “run-of-the-mill” liberals, which are just “disloyal, backstabbing cowards.” NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR O’Reilly laughed at her comments and was amused by both Stewart’s attacks and those from NBC News, who he called
